text: Cold Comfort Farm is a British comedy movie from 1995. It was directed by John Schlesinger. It is based on Stella Gibbons' book of the same name. The movie stars Kate Beckinsale, Joanna Lumley, Ian McKellen and Rufus Sewell. It was first shown on the BBC on 1 January 1995. Category:1995 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger
title: Cold Comfort Farm (movie)
